[_We will review proposals again on Dec 20 but not Dec 27 nor Jan 3._]

**2023-12-13 / @adonovan, @bradfitz, @cherrymui, @griesemer, @rolandshoemaker, @rsc**

  - no change in consensus; **declined**

  - no change in consensus; **declined**

  - no change in consensus; **declined**

  - declined as infeasible

  - declined as infeasible

  - no change in consensus; **declined**
